lom:description.lom:string:
Online tutorial organized around the following topics:
1. Basic Concepts
1. Introduction 2. Abstraction 3. Separation 4. Classes, Objects, and Abstract Interfaces 5. Composition 6. Generalization 7. Putting It All Together
2. Using Objects of a Single Class
1. Introduction 2. Structure of Classes and Objects 3. Manipulating Objects in a Java Application 4. Manipulating GUI Objects in a Simple Programming Environment 5. Named Constants 6. Overloaded Methods 7. Overloaded Methods in Java Classes 8. Arrays of Objects 9. Managing Objects
3. Using Objects of Different Classes
1. Introduction 2. Using Objects for Communicating Data 3. Sequences of Interactions 4. Simple Associations 5. Interfaces 6. More Complex Associations
4. Implementing a New Class
1. Introduction 2. Implementing a Class 3. The Role of Aggregation 4. Simple Static Aggregations 5. More Complex Static Aggregation 6. Dynamic Aggregation 7. The "this" Variable 8. Copying Mutable Objects
5. Designing and Developing a Class
1. Introduction 2. Designing a Class 3. Designing Complex Logic 4. Debugging 5. Organizing Related Classes in Packages 6. Documenting a Class
6. Inheritance
1. Introduction 2. Using Inheritance to Share Implementation 3. Inheriting Methods and Data 4. Replacing Inherited Methods 5. Extending Inherited Methods 6. Hiding Inherited Methods 7. Type Casting 8. Dynamic Binding, Abstract Methods, and Polymorphism 9. Refactoring of Base Classes 10. Designing a Class Hierarchy 11. Design Patterns
7. Building User Interfaces in Java
1. Introduction 2. Structure of a User Interface 3. Two Simple Applications 4. Event Handling 5. Handling Events in a Simple Application 6. Menus 7. Checkboxes 8. Lists 9. Dialogues 10. Scrollbars 11. TextFields 12. Text Fonts 13. Images 14. Custom Components 15. Layout Managers
8. Input/Output in Java
1. Introduction 2. Binary I/O 3. Text I/O 4. Random Access File I/O 5. Object I/O 6. I/O Filtering
9. Threads
1. Introduction 2. Independent Threads 3. Synchronized Threads 4. Distributed Concurrency.

lom:title.lom:string: Object-Oriented Software Design and Construction with Java
